name: Using_the_Markups_List
snippet: TheMarkeringenlijstis a specialized panel with an horizontal layout that provides powerful features for processing, accessing, reviewing, and summarizing the markups

fullData.html:
Gebruik van de Markups List

The Markeringenlijst is a specialized panel with an horizontal layout that provides powerful features for processing, accessing, reviewing, and summarizing the markups on a PDF. It is found at the bottom of the UI standaard .

Users are able to manage and customize columns, create and use complex filters, and generate summaries. For more general reference, see the Markeringenlijst section. To learn about using the Markups list in a Punch workflow, see Een punchlijst maken met de markup -lijst . To learn about using the Markups list in an Estimation/Takeoff workflow, see Resultaten organiseren en samenvatten .

name: Nodig_gebruikers_uit_voor_een_studiosessie
snippet: De Sessiehost is de Persoon Die de Studiosessie Start en BestUurt. Ze begint de Sessie, VOEN Documenten Toe, Nodigen Deelnemers

fullData.html:
Host a Studio Session

De Sessiehost is de Persoon Die de Studiosessie Start en BestUurt. Ze begint de Sessie, VOEN Documenten Toe, Nodigen Deelnemers Uit en Defairen de Beveiliging en machdingen. De Gastheheer Beheert Ook de Sessie Gedurende Zijn Zijn Levenscyclus, voegt nieuwe documenten teen en het het verwijten van oude, het uitnodigen van nieuwe aanwezigen, en zodra de sessie zijn cursus heeft uitgevoerd, het eindrapport het eindrapport voltooide Sessie.

De gastheer HOEFT NNET IN DE SESSIE TE Zijn voor Ander MENSEN OM DEEL TE NEMEN AAN DE SESSIE EN WERK. MENSEN WERKEN OP VERSCHILLENDE TIJDSTIMPEN EN Hebben Verschillende Tijden BelschikBaar voor hen voor Voorschillende soren soenden Werk. EENS EEN SESSIE Wordt Gestart, Iedereen Die Is Uitgenodigd, Kan Inloggen Op de Sessie en Werken Wanneer het voor voor de voor hen Het Handigst is.

Before you can host a Studio Session, you must have a validated Studio account. If you have not created one yet, Doe dat Eerst .

The features available to Attendees when Het Bijwonen van Een Sessie Word Word -ouderlingen Beschreven . This section addresses the features that are unique to the Host.

Een nieuwe sessie begin

You will need a validated Studio account to create a Studio Session. If you have not established one yet, see MAAK EEN STUDIO -ACCOUNT AAN to do so now.

If you have integrated Revu with ProjectWise, new Studio Sessions can be started using ProjectWise files directly from within ProjectWise. See Een Nieuwe Studiosesie starten vanuit een projectwise -Bestand for more information.

Om een ​​nieuwe sessie te starten:

  1. From the Studiopaneel , go to Toevoenen > Nieuwe Sessie . The Start Studiosessie dialog box appears.

    • If you have not already created an account, the Studio -Arcount Aanmaken dialog box appears instead. MAAK EEN STUDIO -ACCOUNT AAN before proceeding.


  2. Enter a name for this Session in the Sessienaam field. The name does not have to be unique.

  3. Click Toevoenen to select PDFs to include in the Session, or click Voeg open bestanden teen to add the files that are currently open in Revu . Files can be added later, as well. See Beheer een sessie below for more information.

    Op : Adding a PDF with a Legende to a Session will cause the Legend to appear as a Momentopnaam for as long as it is in the Session. Once the PDF is taken out of the Session, however, the Legend will resume normal functionality and will automatically update to represent changes made to the PDF while it was in the Session.

  4. Select the desired options from the Koelmacht list. These will apply universal permissions to all Attendees. Check Rood worden , Afdronkken , Aanmaak , Markup Alert , or Documenten Toevoenen to allow Attendees those permissions by default or uncheck them to remove those permissions from Attendees by default.
    • Universal permissions are automatically applied to all attendees who are not subject to individual or group permissions, which can be set up after the Session has been created. See Toogang en Machatisingen Defairen in studiosesies for more information about permissions in Studio Sessions.
  5. To restrict access to the Session by email address, select Beperk Bezoekers per e -mailadres . You will have the opportunity to add allowed attendees on the next screen, or you can do it after the Session has been created (see Beheer een sessie below for more information) . To allow any user with the Session ID to join the Session, uncheck this option.
  6. To set an expiration date for the Session, select SESSIE VerLoopt and enter the desired expiration date and time. Expiration dates must be in the future; Revu will not allow a back-dated expiration date.

  7. Click OK to save the settings and upload the files. The Invite Users dialog box appears.

    Inviting somebody to a Session automatically adds them as an Allowed Attendee in the Session Settings (see Toogang tot Toongang tot Toonang in een studiosesie for more information about Attendee Access) . In addition, the invitee is also sent an email containing information about the Session, as well as a link allowing them to automatically connect to the Session. If you do not wish to do this, click Annuleren ; the Session will be created without invitees. You can send invitations later (see Deelnemers Uitnodigen voor de sessie ) or add Attendees without sending invitations (see Toogang tot Toongang tot Toonang in een studiosesie ) .

  1. There are a few ways to add emails to the invite:
    • Typ van plak e -mails : Select this option to directly enter emails or copy and paste a list from another source.
      • Lists can be separated by commas, semicolons, spaces, have names in brackets in between them, and be a mixture of different formatting styles; Revu will analyze the list and extract recognizable email addresses.
    • Voeg e -Mails Van Groepene Toe : Select this option to add emails from existing Studio Groups.
      • Hele groepen Kunnen Worden Geselecteer, alle Gebruikers Binnen Die Groep Toevoenen, van Gebruikers Kunnen AfzonderliJk Worden Geselecteer Uit een van Meer Groepen.
    • Gebruik Adresboek : Select this option to add emails from your email application's address book.
      • The email application must be MAPI compliant for Revu to access its address book. The address books from web-based email like Gmail and Yahoo cannot be accessed.

  2. After adding email addresses from a source, the Uitnodigen Gebruikers dialog box will show a list of proposed invitees sorted alphabetically and by domain.

    Bekijk Deze Lijst op naauwkeeliRigeid en voltooiing. E -Mailadrassen Kunnen Worden VERWIJDERD EN ANNEREN WORDEN TOEGEVOEGD:

    • To remove an email address, select it and click Verwijten . To remove all the email addresses under a certain domain, click the associated Verwijder het domein icon. You will be asked for confirmation when removing a domain.
    • To add more email addresses, select one of the options from the Voeg e -mails teen menu. Each of the methods described above is available.
  3. To add a message to the invitation before sending it, click Bericht Toevoenen . Messages have a 10,000 character limit and a counter will show you how close you are to the limit as you compose it.
  4. When you're satisfied with the invite list, click Nodig deelnemers uit . Emails are sent to each address in your invite list from the Studio server.
SESSIE -INSTELLINGEN Configureren

By default, all Attendees are granted the default permissions that were assigned during the creation of the Session. Additionally, if the Beperk Bezoekers per e -mailadres option was used, only those people who were invited during the creation of the Session will have access to it to begin with. You can change these conditions by configuring the Session Settings. See Toogang en Machatisingen Defairen in studiosesies .

Een sessie beheren

Once a Sessie is Gemaakt , its Deelnemersslijst set , and all the TOEGEWEZEN MACHTIGINGEN , it often requires no additional management.  However, documenteren , Deelnemers , and machdingen can be added or removed as needed over the course of a Session.

Toogang Tot de Deelnemer

Many changes to the Attendee access can be made during a Session: Uitnodigingen Kunnen Worden Verzonden naar Nieuwe Aanwezigen , Gebruikers Kunnen Toongang Worden Geweigd , De Beperkingsstatus van de sessie Kan Worden GEWIJZIGD , and Herinneringen GestUurd Naar Genodigden Die Niet -Zijn Aangesloten .

Deelnemers Uitnodigen voor de sessie

  1. Click Uitnodiging at the top of the Attendees section of the Studiopaneel . The Uitnodigen Gebruikers dialog box appears.

  1. There are a few ways to add emails to the invite:
    • Typ van plak e -mails : Select this option to directly enter emails or copy and paste a list from another source.
      • Lists can be separated by commas, semicolons, spaces, have names in brackets in between them, and be a mixture of different formatting styles; Revu will analyze the list and extract recognizable email addresses.
    • Voeg e -Mails Van Groepene Toe : Select this option to add emails from existing Studio Groups.
      • Hele gropenen Kunnen Worden Geselecteer, alle Gebruikers Binnen Die Groep Toevoenen, van Gebruikers Kunnen AfzonderliJk Worden Geselecteer Uit een van Meer Groepen.
    • Gebruik Adresboek : Select this option to add emails from your email application's address book.
      • The email application must be MAPI compliant for Revu to access its address book. The address books from web-based email like Gmail and Yahoo cannot be accessed.

  2. After adding email addresses from a source, the Uitnodigen Gebruikers dialog box will show a list of proposed invitees sorted alphabetically and by domain.

    Bekijk Deze Lijst op naauwkeeliRigeid en voltooiing. E -Mailadrassen Kunnen Worden VERWIJDERD EN ANNEREN WORDEN TOEGEVOEGD:

    • To remove an email address, select it and click Verwijten . To remove all the email addresses under a certain domain, click the associated Verwijder het domein icon. You will be asked for confirmation when removing a domain.
    • To add more email addresses, select one of the options from the Voeg e -mails teen menu. Each of the methods described above is available.
  3. To add a message to the invitation before sending it, click Bericht Toevoenen . Messages have a 10,000 character limit and a counter will show you how close you are to the limit as you compose it.
  4. When you're satisfied with the invite list, click Nodig deelnemers uit . Emails are sent to each address in your invite list from the Studio server.
Iemand Weigeren tegang tot een sessie

Sometimes it is necessary to deny somebody access to a Session after they have attended and participated in the Session (as opposed to denying somebody access to a Session preemptively, Die hiër Wordt Bevschreven ). This action locks the denied user out of the Session and precludes them from accessing its documents, records, and so on. During the process, you will be given an opportunity to reassign control of their markups to somebody else in the Session, giving that person the ability change or delete those markups. Note that somebody cannot be denied access to a Session while they are signed into it. There are a few ways to deny somebody access to a Session:

  • Join the Session, then right-click the name in the Samsevoetd list and select Ontkennen .

  • Join the Session, then click Toogang Tot de Deelnemer . When the Toogang Tot de Deelnemer dialog box appears, select the name in the list and click Ontkennen .

  • Join the Session, then click SESSIE -INSTELLEN . When the SESSIE -INSTELLEN dialog box appears, click the Deelnemers tab, then select the desired name and click Ontkennen .

Wanneer u iemand Uit de sessie Verwijdert ontmoette Behulp van Een van de Bovenstaane Methoden, WordT U Gevraagd Wat u Moe Doen ontmoette Betrekking tot controle over Hun Markups.

Ordinarily, when somebody is removed from a Session any markups they placed end up locked and not editable. This is the default option and, if that is the desired outcome (or if you know the person placed no markups and thus has none to reassign), leave LAAT IEMAND ANDERS Zijn Markups Niet -bezien selected and click De Gebruiker Weigeren .

In some cases, it is preferable to assign control over the user's markups to somebody else. To do so, select Opnieuuw toewijzen om hun markups te bewers and choose the person who assume control over their markups from the dropdown list that appears, then click De Gebruiker Weigeren .

Voorzichtigheid: Users who have been denied access to a Session and had their markups reassigned niet be readmitted to the Session.

Laat op de bovenstaante voorzichtiEid van een paar dingen bijet het opnieuuw toewijzen Van markup -controle:

  • MARKUP -controle kan alle Worden ToeGewezen Aan Aan Een Huidige Sessie -DeelNemers en Die Persoon Moet Revu 2016.5 van Hoger Gebruiken. Als de GEwenste Persoon nog niet is niet -getegetredden tot de sessie, MOETEN ZE DUNEN voordat de markup -westing aan ken kan kan kane Worden ToeGewezen.
  • Meerdere gebruikers kunnen tegelijkertijd de toegang tot de sessie worden geweigerd, maar al hun markups moeten op dezelfde manier worden afgehandeld: geen van hen wordt opnieuw toegewezen of ze worden allemaal opnieuw toegewezen aan dezelfde persoon.
  • Markup reassignment will be recorded in the Sessielogboek and reflected in the Markeringenlijst . In addition, reassignments will also show up in Sessierapporten and Samenvattingen when those reporting options are selected.
  • Deelnemers Aan Wie Markup Control is ToeGewezen, ontvangene een E -Mail Die Hen Informeerert over de Opdracht. Als ze momentel in de sessie Zijn, Kunnen ze ook een melding krijgen in de aanvraag en worden gevraagd om de sessie te verlaten en opnieuw in te varen.

An Attendee can be allowed back into the Session after they have been denied access Zolang de controle over hun markups Niet -opnieuw werden ToeGewezen . Simply follow one of the methods described above and click Toestaan instead of Ontkennen .

De touwang tot een bestaat sessie beperken

U Kunt uvoor Kiezen om de Tegang tot een sessie te beperken om alle aleen Uitnodigingen te Zijn, Zelfs als u deze optie niet hebt Gekzen Bijet Maken van de Sessie. Hiermee Kunnen alle AGEGANG TOT MENSEN DIE U OPGEEFT. Doe een van de Volgende Om deze optie voor de bestaante sessie in Te Schakelen:

  • Join the Session, then click Toogang Tot de Deelnemer . When the Toogang Tot de Deelnemer dialog box appears, check Bepperk de AanweZigen per e-mailadres and click OK .
  • Join the Session, then click click SESSIE -INSTELLEN . When the SESSIE -INSTELLEN dialog box appears, click the Deelnemers tab, then check Bepperk de AanweZigen per e-mailadres and click OK .

Once you have turned this option on, be sure to confirm that everybody you wish to include in the Session are allowed in, either by Ze Uitnodigen or by Ze Toevoenen Aan de Lijst ontmoette AanweZigen .

Herinneringen Verzenden

After inviting users to join your Session, they will be listed on the Studiopaneel as having either Samsevoetd or Niet -SamengeVoetd . You can send a customized reminder to those who have not yet joined.

  1. Join the Session and select the Niet -SamengeVoetd tab. Any invitees who have not yet joined the Session will be listed here. Before they join, invitees are identified by their email address only.

  2. Select the invitees to whom you wish to send a reminder by checking the box beside their email address. To send reminders to everybody in the list, check the box beside Selecteer OM TE TE HERINNEREN at the top of the list.

  3. Click Stuur een herinnering to compose and send a reminder to the selected invitees. Reminder messages have a 10,000 character limit and a counter will show you how close you are to the limit as you compose it.
Documentheren

Documenten Kunnen Worden toegevoetd Wanneer Kan ook documenten toevoenen en verwijten tijdens de sessie.

Adding a File

Session attendees with the Documenten toStemming Toevoenen can add files to the Session.

Adding a PDF with a Legende to a Session will cause the Legend to appear as a Momentopnaam for as long as it is in the Session. Once the PDF is taken out of the Session, however, the Legend will resume normal functionality and will automatically update to represent changes made to the PDF while it was in the Session.

  1. Doe Mee ontmoette de Sessie.
  2. Click Voeg bestand teen in the Documenteren section of the Studiopaneel .
    • If the desired PDF is already open in Revu , you can also right-click it and select Toevoenen Aan Open Studio Session to add it directly.

  3. Navigate to and select the desired file or files and click Open .

    Op : In order to upload or download a file in Studio, the system clock of the local machine must be set up correctly so that it is in sync (within 15 minutes) with UTC, otherwise any attempt to upload or download a file in Studio will result in an error. Update the system clock of the local machine so that it is correct for the time zone specified in its Date and Time settings and try the upload or download again.

Deleting a File

Er Zijn Twee Manieren om delete a file from a Session:

  • Join the Session, then right-click on the name in the Documenteren section of the Studio -tabblad and select Verwijten .
  • Join the Session, then click Verwijten at the right of the document name in the Documenteren section of the Studiopaneel . This icon will appear when the mouse is moved over the document's name.
VRAGEN DAT ALLE AANWEZIGEN DE GASTHERE VOLGEN

While a Session Attendee can choose to VOLG EEN ANDER DEELNEMER , a Session Host can request that all Attendees of a Session follow them at the same time.  This ability is only available to Session Hosts and can only be used when the Host is joined by two or more attendees. To invoke the request, do one of the following:

  • Join the Session, then click the Volgen icon at the right your own name in the Deelnemers list of the Studiopaneel (as if you were trying to follow yourself).
  • Join the Session, then type "follow me" (without the quotes) in the chat field at the bottom of the Studiopaneel .

A request to follow the Session Host will be sent to all Session attendees, enabling multiple Attendees to follow the Host at the same time. Attendees must Accepteer Het verzoek om te begin Anden Met Het Volgen van de Host .

Een sessieveerslag Maken

At any point during the course of a Session you can generate a Session Report and save it to your computer. You will also have the opportunity to create such a report when you MAAK DE SESSIE AF .

Om een ​​sessieveerslag te maken:

  1. Doe Mee ontmoette de Sessie.

  2. Click Verstandhouding under the Dossier tab of the Studiopaneel . The Sessierapport dialog box appears.

  3. Select the Type of report that you would like to create:
    • Recordoverzicht creates a PDF file containing the contents of the Recordsectie van Het Tabblad Studio .
    • Pdf -pakketrapport creates a PDF package containing the Record Summary and all of the documents in the session.

    • Combineer Bestand S Verstandhouding creates a single PDF that contains the Record Summary and all of the documents in the session.

      Op : The Pdf -pakketrapport and Combinatie Bestand S Verstandhouding contain hyperlinks in the Record Summary that link to the corresponding markup in the document â just like you are still within the session. This lets you review the Record and then jump to the markup in the document.

  4. Enter a Titel for the PDF file or package that will be created.
  5. Enter a heading for any Op S you wish to include in the report and add the notes in the field immediately below.
  6. Select the Paginegrootte and orientation ( Portret or Landschap ) .
  7. Select any or all of the following opties :
    • Voeg de Lijst ontmoette Deelnemers Toe : When selected, the Report Summary will include a list of Session Attendees.
    • Voeg documentenlijst teen : When selected, the Report Summary will include a list of Session Documents.
    • Neem recorditems op : When selected, the Report Summary will include a list of the Session's historical events, as captured on the Session's Records Tab .
      • Alleen Gefilterde -items : When selected, the list of the Session's historical events will respect the filters currently in effect on the Session's Records Tab . If this option is selected, a note will be added to the Report Summary regarding which filters were in effect when the report was created.
  8. Select the Kolommen from the Session's Records tab that should be included in the report. Choices include: Datum , Tijd , Document and Pagina .
  9. Click OK to create the Report.
Een sessie afmaken

Finishing a Session ends the Session and removes its documents from the Studio server. Only Hosts and users with VOLDIGE MACHTIGINGEN to the Session can finish it. You will have the opportunity to create a Sessierapport and save Session documents, as desired.

Om een ​​sessie af te maken:

  1. Word Lid Van de Sessie en Zorg Ervoor Dat niemand in de sessie Werkt Aan Sessiedocumenten.

  2. From the <Sessienaam & id -menu> , select Afwerking -sessie .

    The Afwerking -sessie dialog box appears.

  3. To include the markups of specific Attendees in the Session documents that you choose to save, select those Attendees in the Erbij Betrekken Markeren list.
  4. Choose one of the Bewaar -opties :
    • Opslaan (Bestaante overschrijven) saves the files back to the locations from which they were originally uploaded to the Session and overwrite any files with the same name that are currently there. This essentially replaces the original files with the ones from the Session. Do not choose this option if you need to preserve the original files and have not made backups already.
    • Opslaan in kaart saves the Session documents in a specified folder. To change the default folder location, click and navigate to the desired folder.
      • Select Sessiemap to create a subfolder with the Session name in the specified location.
    • SLA Niet op bestanden op discards the Session documents without saving them.
  5. Select Sluit bestanden na het voltooien to automatically close any Session files that are currently open in Revu when the Session is finished, otherwise they will stay open.
  6. Select Genereer -rapport to generate a Sessierapport before finishing the Session. To specify the Session Report settings, click Opzetten and the Sessierapport dialog box will appear. See Sessierapport for more information about Session Report settings.
    • The Session Report is saved in the folder specified in the field below. To change the default folder location, click and navigate to the desired folder.

  7. Click OK to finish the Session.

    Op : The Session and all of its files are removed from the Studio server when the Session is finished. This can be undone through the Studioportaal within a limited time frame. See support.bluebeam.com for more information about recovering finalized or archived Studio Sessions.

  3. To add a message to the invitation before sending it, click Bericht Toevoenen . Messages have a 10,000 character limit and a counter will show you how close you are to the limit as you compose it.
  4. When you're satisfied with the invite list, click Nodig deelnemers uit . Emails are sent to each address in your invite list from the Studio server.
SESSIE -INSTELLINGEN Configureren

By default, all Attendees are granted the default permissions that were assigned during the creation of the Session. Additionally, if the Beperk Bezoekers per e -mailadres option was used, only those people who were invited during the creation of the Session will have access to it to begin with. You can change these conditions by configuring the Session Settings. See Toogang en Machatisingen Defairen in studiosesies .

Een sessie beheren

Once a Sessie is Gemaakt , its Deelnemersslijst set , and all the TOEGEWEZEN MACHTIGINGEN , it often requires no additional management.  However, documenteren , Deelnemers , and machdingen can be added or removed as needed over the course of a Session.

Toogang Tot de Deelnemer

Many changes to the Attendee access can be made during a Session: Uitnodigingen Kunnen Worden Verzonden naar Nieuwe Aanwezigen , Gebruikers Kunnen Toongang Worden Geweigd , De Beperkingsstatus van de sessie Kan Worden GEWIJZIGD , and Herinneringen GestUurd Naar Genodigden Die Niet -Zijn Aangesloten .

Deelnemers Uitnodigen voor de sessie

  1. Click Uitnodiging at the top of the Attendees section of the Studiopaneel . The Uitnodigen Gebruikers dialog box appears.

  1. There are a few ways to add emails to the invite:
    • Typ van plak e -mails : Select this option to directly enter emails or copy and paste a list from another source.
      • Lists can be separated by commas, semicolons, spaces, have names in brackets in between them, and be a mixture of different formatting styles; Revu will analyze the list and extract recognizable email addresses.
    • Voeg e -Mails Van Groepen teen : Select this option to add emails from existing Studio Groups.
      • Hele gropenen Kunnen Worden Geselecteer, alle Gebruikers Binnen Die Groep Toevoenen, van Gebruikers Kunnen AfzonderliJk Worden Geselecteer Uit een van Meer Groepen.
    • Gebruik Adresboek : Select this option to add emails from your email application's address book.
      • The email application must be MAPI compliant for Revu to access its address book. The address books from web-based email like Gmail and Yahoo cannot be accessed.

  2. After adding email addresses from a source, the Uitnodigen Gebruikers dialog box will show a list of proposed invitees sorted alphabetically and by domain.

    Bekijk Deze Lijst op naauwkeeliRigeid en voltooiing. E -Mailadrassen Kunnen Worden VERWIJDERD EN ANNEREN WORDEN TOEGEVOEGD:

    • To remove an email address, select it and click Verwijten . To remove all the email addresses under a certain domain, click the associated Verwijder het domein icon. You will be asked for confirmation when removing a domain.
    • To add more email addresses, select one of the options from the Voeg e -mails teen menu. Each of the methods described above is available.
  3. To add a message to the invitation before sending it, click Bericht Toevoenen . Messages have a 10,000 character limit and a counter will show you how close you are to the limit as you compose it.
  4. When you're satisfied with the invite list, click Nodig deelnemers uit . Emails are sent to each address in your invite list from the Studio server.
Iemand Weigeren tegang tot een sessie

Sometimes it is necessary to deny somebody access to a Session after they have attended and participated in the Session (as opposed to denying somebody access to a Session preemptively, Die hiër Wordt Bevschreven ). This action locks the denied user out of the Session and precludes them from accessing its documents, records, and so on. During the process, you will be given an opportunity to reassign control of their markups to somebody else in the Session, giving that person the ability change or delete those markups. Note that somebody cannot be denied access to a Session while they are signed into it. There are a few ways to deny somebody access to a Session:

  • Join the Session, then right-click the name in the Samsevoetd list and select Ontkennen .

  • Join the Session, then click Toogang Tot de Deelnemer . When the Toogang Tot de Deelnemer dialog box appears, select the name in the list and click Ontkennen .

  • Join the Session, then click SESSIE -INSTELLEN . When the SESSIE -INSTELLEN dialog box appears, click the Deelnemers tab, then select the desired name and click Ontkennen .

Wanneer u iemand Uit de sessie Verwijdert ontmoette Behulp van Een van de Bovenstaane Methoden, WordT U Gevraagd Wat u Moe Doen ontmoette Betrekking tot controle over Hun Markups.

Ordinarily, when somebody is removed from a Session any markups they placed end up locked and not editable. This is the default option and, if that is the desired outcome (or if you know the person placed no markups and thus has none to reassign), leave LAAT IEMAND ANDERS Zijn Markups Niet -bezien selected and click De Gebruiker Weigeren .

In some cases, it is preferable to assign control over the user's markups to somebody else. To do so, select Opnieuuw toewijzen om hun markups te bewers and choose the person who assume control over their markups from the dropdown list that appears, then click De Gebruiker Weigeren .

Voorzichtigheid: Users who have been denied access to a Session and had their markups reassigned niet be readmitted to the Session.

Laat op de bovenstaante voorzichtiEid van een paar dingen bijet het opnieuuw toewijzen Van markup -controle:

  • MARKUP -controle kan alle Worden ToeGewezen Aan Aan Een Huidige Sessie -DeelNemers en Die Persoon Moet Revu 2016.5 van Hoger Gebruiken. Als de GEwenste Persoon nog niet is niet -getegetredden tot de sessie, MOETEN ZE DUNEN voordat de markup -westing aan ken kan kan kane Worden ToeGewezen.
  • Meerder -Gebruikers Kunnen Tegelijkijd de Toegang tot de sessie Worden Geweig, maar Hun Markups Mooeten op dezelfde manier WORDEWEWEZEN AAN DEZEZEN ANAN DEZEZEN ANAN DEZEZEN ANAN DEZEZEN ANAN DEZEZEN ANAN DEZEZEN ANAN DEZEZEN AANTEZEN AANTEZEN AANTEZEN AANTEZEN AANTEZEN AANTEZEN AANTEZEN AANTEZEN AANTEZEN AANTEZEN ANAN DEZEZEN ANANDEZEN ANAN DEZELD PEROON.
  • Markup reassignment will be recorded in the Sessielogboek and reflected in the Markeringenlijst . In addition, reassignments will also show up in Sessierapporten and Samenvattingen when those reporting options are selected.
  • Deelnemers Aan Wie Markup Control is ToeGewezen, ontvangene een E -Mail Die Hen Informeerert over de Opdracht. Als ze momentel in de sessie Zijn, Kunnen ze ook een melding krijgen in de aanvraag en worden gevraagd om de sessie te verlaten en opnieuw in te varen.

An Attendee can be allowed back into the Session after they have been denied access Zolang de controle over hun markups Niet -opnieuw werden ToeGewezen . Simply follow one of the methods described above and click Toestaan instead of Ontkennen .

De touwang tot een bestaat sessie beperken

U Kunt uvoor Kiezen om de Tegang tot een sessie te beperken om alleen Uitnodigingen te zijn, zelfs als u deze optie niet hebt Gekzen Bijet Maken van de Sessie. Hiermee Kunnen alle AGEGANG TOT MENSEN DIE U OPGEEFT. Doe een van de Volgende Om deze optie voor de bestaante sessie in Te Schakelen:

  • Join the Session, then click Toogang Tot de Deelnemer . When the Toogang Tot de Deelnemer dialog box appears, check Bepperk de AanweZigen per e-mailadres and click OK .
  • Join the Session, then click click SESSIE -INSTELLEN . When the SESSIE -INSTELLEN dialog box appears, click the Deelnemers tab, then check Bepperk de AanweZigen per e-mailadres and click OK .

Once you have turned this option on, be sure to confirm that everybody you wish to include in the Session are allowed in, either by Ze Uitnodigen or by Ze Toevoenen Aan de Lijst ontmoette AanweZigen .

Herinneringen Verzenden

After inviting users to join your Session, they will be listed on the Studiopaneel as having either Samsevoetd or Niet -SamengeVoetd . You can send a customized reminder to those who have not yet joined.

  1. Join the Session and select the Niet -SamengeVoetd tab. Any invitees who have not yet joined the Session will be listed here. Before they join, invitees are identified by their email address only.

  2. Select the invitees to whom you wish to send a reminder by checking the box beside their email address. To send reminders to everybody in the list, check the box beside Selecteer OM TE TE HERINNEREN at the top of the list.

  3. Click Stuur een herinnering to compose and send a reminder to the selected invitees. Reminder messages have a 10,000 character limit and a counter will show you how close you are to the limit as you compose it.
Documentheren

Documenten Kunnen Worden toegevoetd Wanneer Kan ook documenten toevoenen en verwijten tijdens de sessie.

Adding a File

Session attendees with the Documenten toStemming Toevoenen can add files to the Session.

Adding a PDF with a Legende to a Session will cause the Legend to appear as a Momentopnaam for as long as it is in the Session. Once the PDF is taken out of the Session, however, the Legend will resume normal functionality and will automatically update to represent changes made to the PDF while it was in the Session.

  1. Doe Mee ontmoette de Sessie.
  2. Click Voeg bestand teen in the Documenteren section of the Studiopaneel .
    • If the desired PDF is already open in Revu , you can also right-click it and select Toevoenen Aan Open Studio Session to add it directly.

  3. Navigate to and select the desired file or files and click Open .

    Op : In order to upload or download a file in Studio, the system clock of the local machine must be set up correctly so that it is in sync (within 15 minutes) with UTC, otherwise any attempt to upload or download a file in Studio will result in an error. Update the system clock of the local machine so that it is correct for the time zone specified in its Date and Time settings and try the upload or download again.

Deleting a File

Er Zijn Twee Manieren om delete a file from a Session:

  • Join the Session, then right-click on the name in the Documenteren section of the Studio -tabblad and select Verwijten .
  • Join the Session, then click Verwijten at the right of the document name in the Documenteren section of the Studiopaneel . This icon will appear when the mouse is moved over the document's name.
VRAGEN DAT ALLE AANWEZIGEN DE GASTHERE VOLGEN

While a Session Attendee can choose to VOLG EEN ANDER DEELNEMER , a Session Host can request that all Attendees of a Session follow them at the same time.  This ability is only available to Session Hosts and can only be used when the Host is joined by two or more attendees. To invoke the request, do one of the following:

  • Join the Session, then click the Volgen icon at the right your own name in the Deelnemers list of the Studiopaneel (as if you were trying to follow yourself).
  • Join the Session, then type "follow me" (without the quotes) in the chat field at the bottom of the Studiopaneel .

A request to follow the Session Host will be sent to all Session attendees, enabling multiple Attendees to follow the Host at the same time. Attendees must Accepteer Het verzoek om te begin Anden Met Het Volgen van de Host .

Een sessieveerslag Maken

At any point during the course of a Session you can generate a Session Report and save it to your computer. You will also have the opportunity to create such a report when you MAAK DE SESSIE AF .

Om een ​​sessieveerslag te maken:

  1. Doe Mee ontmoette de Sessie.

  2. Click Verstandhouding under the Dossier tab of the Studiopaneel . The Sessierapport dialog box appears.

  3. Select the Type of report that you would like to create:
    • Recordoverzicht creates a PDF file containing the contents of the Recordsectie van Het Tabblad Studio .
    • Pdf -pakketrapport creates a PDF package containing the Record Summary and all of the documents in the session.

    • Combineer Bestand S Verstandhouding creates a single PDF that contains the Record Summary and all of the documents in the session.

      Op : The Pdf -pakketrapport and Combinatie Bestand S Verstandhouding contain hyperlinks in the Record Summary that link to the corresponding markup in the document â just like you are still within the session. This lets you review the Record and then jump to the markup in the document.

  4. Enter a Titel for the PDF file or package that will be created.
  5. Enter a heading for any Op S you wish to include in the report and add the notes in the field immediately below.
  6. Select the Paginegrootte and orientation ( Portret or Landschap ) .
  7. Select any or all of the following opties :
    • Voeg de Lijst ontmoette Deelnemers Toe : When selected, the Report Summary will include a list of Session Attendees.
    • Voeg documentenlijst teen : When selected, the Report Summary will include a list of Session Documents.
    • Neem recorditems op : When selected, the Report Summary will include a list of the Session's historical events, as captured on the Session's Records Tab .
      • Alleen Gefilterde -items : When selected, the list of the Session's historical events will respect the filters currently in effect on the Session's Records Tab . If this option is selected, a note will be added to the Report Summary regarding which filters were in effect when the report was created.
  8. Select the Kolommen from the Session's Records tab that should be included in the report. Choices include: Datum , Tijd , Document and Pagina .
  9. Click OK to create the Report.
Een sessie afmaken

Finishing a Session ends the Session and removes its documents from the Studio server. Only Hosts and users with VOLDIGE MACHTIGINGEN to the Session can finish it. You will have the opportunity to create a Sessierapport and save Session documents, as desired.

Om een ​​sessie af te maken:

  1. Word Lid Van de Sessie en Zorg Ervoor Dat niemand in de sessie Werkt Aan Sessiedocumenten.

  2. From the <Sessienaam & id -menu> , select Afwerking -sessie .

    The Afwerking -sessie dialog box appears.

  3. To include the markups of specific Attendees in the Session documents that you choose to save, select those Attendees in the Erbij Betrekken Markeren list.
  4. Choose one of the Bewaar -opties :
    • Opslaan (Bestaante overschrijven) saves the files back to the locations from which they were originally uploaded to the Session and overwrite any files with the same name that are currently there. This essentially replaces the original files with the ones from the Session. Do not choose this option if you need to preserve the original files and have not made backups already.
    • Opslaan in kaart saves the Session documents in a specified folder. To change the default folder location, click and navigate to the desired folder.
      • Select Sessiemap to create a subfolder with the Session name in the specified location.
    • SLA Niet op bestanden op discards the Session documents without saving them.
  5. Select Sluit bestanden na het voltooien to automatically close any Session files that are currently open in Revu when the Session is finished, otherwise they will stay open.
  6. Select Genereer -rapport to generate a Sessierapport before finishing the Session. To specify the Session Report settings, click Opzetten and the Sessierapport dialog box will appear. See Sessierapport for more information about Session Report settings.
    • The Session Report is saved in the folder specified in the field below. To change the default folder location, click and navigate to the desired folder.

  7. Click OK to finish the Session.

    Op : The Session and all of its files are removed from the Studio server when the Session is finished. This can be undone through the Studioportaal within a limited time frame. See support.bluebeam.com for more information about recovering finalized or archived Studio Sessions.

name: Stel_studiosessierechten_instellen
snippet: Permissions can be defined in Studio to grant or deny users access to specificSessiesand to define whatDeelnemerscan do in thoseSessies.

fullData.html:
Defining Access and Permissions in Studio Sessions

Permissions can be defined in Studio to grant or deny users access to specific Sessies and to define what Deelnemers can do in those Sessies . Permissions can be defined for individual Deelnemers or groups of Deelnemers and can be set up before the Deelnemers join the Sessie or even before they set up a Studio account.

Sessies Kunnen ook Worden Ingesteld om op een specifieke datum af te lopen.

Een sessie -vervaldatum instellen

Studio Sessions can be configured to have an expiration date. This date can be set up at the time the Sessie is Gemaakt or it can be configured afterward. Once an expiration date is set, it can be changed if necessary.

Om een ​​vervaldatum in te stellen van te wijZigen:

  1. When in a Session, click SESSIE -INSTELLEN . The SESSIE -INSTELLEN dialog box appears.

  2. If an expiration date has already been set, Ingeschakeld will be selected.
    • To disable the expiration date, uncheck Ingeschakeld .
    • To change the expiration date or time, change the appropriate value to the right of Ingeschakeld .
  3. If no expiration date is currently set, you can set one by selecting Ingeschakeld and entering the desired expiration date in the fields to its right.
  4. Click OK .

Op : Expiration dates must be in the future; Revu will not allow a back-dated expiration date.

Revu will send the Host and attendees email notifications as the Session approaches its expiration date. Notifications are sent out:

  • Zeven Dagen vóór het het versstrijlt
  • Twee Dagen Vóór het het versTriJken
  • 24 uur vóór Het versierjken
  • Nadat de Sessie is Verlopen

Evenzo word melding Verzonden als de vervaldatum van de sessie Word Gewijzing.

Toogang tot Toongang tot Toonang in een studiosesie

Adding een deelnemer to a Sessie can have different effects depending on whether or not the Sessie is set to restrict access. When Beeperken Deelnemers is enabled, adding een deelnemer is the only way to grant them access. Conversely, when Beeperken Deelnemers is not enabled, adding een deelnemer is the only way to deny them access. Restricted Deelnemer access is discussed in more detail below.

Adding a user to a Sessie does not send them an invitation to join the Sessie . Additionally, it is done for one person at a time and only by email address. If you want to invite several new Deelnemers or just send invitations while adding a few, see Deelnemers Uitnodigen voor de sessie .

To add een deelnemer to the Sessie :

  1. When in a Session, click SESSIE -INSTELLEN . The SESSIE -INSTELLEN dialog box appears.

  2. Click the Deelnemers tab. Previously added users will appear in the list.

  3. To add new, individual users, click . The Voeg e -mailadres teen dialog box opens.  Enter the user's email address and click OK .
  4. To add the users in a Groepen , click . The Selecteer Groten dialog box opens. Select the desired group and click OK . All the users in that Group are automatically added.

    Op : Only Session owners and those with Volledige controle permissions can use Groups to add users to a Session. Bear in mind, however, that the only Groups shown here are those of the Session owner. Somebody with Full Control permissions can use the owner's Groups to add users, but they will not be able to use their own and they will not be able to alter the users in the owner's Groups.

  5. By default, all users added to the Deelnemers tab automatically have their Toongang set to Toestaan . To deny access to a specific user (for example, one brought in with a Groepen that should not have access to this specific Sessie ), select the desired user and click Ontkennen . The Ontzeg Gebruikers dialog box will appear: leave the default option LAAT IEMAND ANDERS Zijn Markups Niet -bezien selected and click De Gebruiker Weigeren .
  6. To restrict access to this Sessie to only those users listed on the Deelnemers tab whose Toongang is set to Toestaan , select Beeperken Deelnemers .
    • The relationship between this setting and a user's Toongang status (either Toestaan or Ontkennen ) lets you set up the equivalent of a "white list" or a "black list" and merits some further explanation:
      • When Beeperken Deelnemers is checked, only users listed here on the Deelnemers tab whose Toongang is set to Toestaan will be able to access this Sessie . This is the equivalent of a "white list."
      • When Beeperken Deelnemers is not checked, any user can access the Sessie except for those listed here on the Deelnemers tab whose Toongang is set to Ontkennen . This is the equivalent of a "black list."
  7. Click OK .
Machdingen instellen in een studiosesie
  1. When in a Session, click SESSIE -INSTELLEN . The SESSIE -INSTELLEN dialog box appears.

  2. Click the Machdingen tab.

    The default group, Deelnemers , will be shown, as well as any other users or Groepen that have been previously added. The Deelnemers group applies to all users in the Sessie and its initial permission settings are configured when the Sessie is Gemaakt . It cannot be deleted. Most permissions for the Deelnemers group are set to Ontkennen when the Sessie is created; a recommended best practice is to give additional permissions to specific users and Groups rather than allow greater access to the Deelnemers group.

  3. To add individual users or Groepen :
    1. Click . The Voeg Gebruikers/Groepene teen dialog box opens.

    2. Select the desired user or group and click OK . Be aware that only the owner's Groups are shown as they are the only ones that can be used in the Sessie . By default, when users and Groups are added they inherit the permissions of the Deelnemers group.

      • If you are the Sessie owner and would like to create a new Group for this Sessie or change the membership of one currently being used, click Beheer Groepen . See Studio -Groepen voor Meer Informatie over het Maken en Beheren van Groepen. Users with Full Control permissions can also use Beheer Groepen to manage their own groups, but they will not be able to use those groups in this Sessie nor will they be able to alter any of the owner's Groups.

        Op : When creating Groups, keep in mind that Revu will allow somebody to be in multiple Groups within the same Session van project ; when this occurs, that person's permissions will default to whichever is the most restrictive. As such, adding somebody who is already in a Group to a second Group might not have the desired effect, either by not granting expected permissions (because the first Group's are more restrictive), or by imposing undesired restrictions (because the second Group's are more restrictive).

  4. To change the permissions for a user or Groepen :
    1. Select the desired user or Group in the Gebruikers/gropen list.
    2. Select the desired permission in the Tegegepaste Machdingen list. A dropdown list arrow will appear to the right of the selected permission.
    3. Select a permission setting from the dropdown list.
      • When defining permissions for the Deelnemers group, the options are Ontkennen or Toestaan .
      • When defining permission for all other users and Groups, then options are blank , Ontkennen or Toestaan . Selecting blank will cause the user or Group to inherit the permission defined for the Deelnemers group.
      • The Volledige controle permission is powerful and setting it to Toestaan gives the user or Group of users administrator powers. The effects of this are:
        • All permissions for administrators are set to Toestaan .
        • Administrators can rename the Sessie .
        • Administrators can de sessie Afranden .
        • Administrators can manage Toogang Tot de Deelnemer .

        • Administrators can manage Permissions for other Deelnemers .

        Er Zijn ECHTER ENKELE LIMIETEN OVE WAT BIJLERDERS KUNNEN DONEN:

        • BEEMERDERS Kunnen de gastheer Niet -Blokkeren.
        • Administrators do not have access to the Host's (or any other administrator's) Groepen .
  5. To remove a user or Group, select them and click .
  6. Click OK .
TESTEMMige Hiërarchieën

Bijet instellen van machatisingen zijn er twee -sets hiërarchieën om in Gedachten te houden: machtigingssets en toStemmingstOstanden.

  • EEN MACHTIGINGSSET BELCHrijft Hoe een Gebruiker Zijn Machzingen Kreeg: Zijn ze specifiek Aan de Gebruiker ToeGewezen (individuele machtigingen)? Heeft de Gebruiker Ze Opgehaald Op Grond van het Behoren tot een Bepaalde Groep (Groepsreechten)? Van Heeft de Gebruiker Standard de Algemene Machatisingen GestUurd OmDat Geen van de Vorige Twee Voorwaarden was Voldaan (Algemene Machdingen)?
  • A Permission State describes whether the user is permitted to perform a certain task (Allow) or not (Deny). For individual users and Groups, permission states can either be specifically selected (Explicit) or they can be blanco , causing them to default to whatever the corresponding permission state is for the Deelnemers group (Inherited).

Permission States work binnenin Permission Sets and generally come into play only to resolve conflicts that arise when a user is a member of two or more Groups that have conflicting permissions (see examples 4 and 5 below for further illustration). It is generally recommended that people not be added to multiple Groups, but in the event that it is necessary, Hosts and administrators should coordinate to ensure that the proper permissions are granted.

Hiërarchieën

De hiërarchieën zijn:

ToStemmingssets

  1. Individuele machatisingen (dat wil zeggen die opgeZet voor een specifieke gebruiker) Hebben Primair Belang.
  2. Group permissions (that is, those set up for a Groep Die je hebt Gemaakt ) have secondary importance.
  3. General permissions (that is, those set up for the default Deelnemers group) have the least importance.

ToStemmingsstaten

  1. Expliciete Ontkennen (dat wil zeggen een toStemming Die specifieek is ingesteld om te ontkennnen) heeft een primair belang.
  2. Expliciet Toestaan ​​(dat Wil Zeggen, een toStemming Die specifiek is ingesteld om teen te staan) heeft een secundair Belang.
  3. Inherited State (that is, any permissionâwhether it is Deny or Allowâthat is inherited from the default Deelnemers group) has the least importance.

Voorbeelden

Met Deze Hiërarchieën in Gedachten, Zijn hier een paar Voorbeelden die Mooeten helpen illustreren Hoe de Werkelijke machdingen van een Gebruiker Woord Bepaald:

  1. User Alice has individual permissions set up and the Documenten Toevoenen permission is set to Ontkennen . User Alice also belongs to Group A and the permissions for Documenten Toevoenen for Group A is set to Toestaan . Alice ZAL NIET be able to Documenten Toevoenen to the Sessie .
    • Haar individuele machatiserings neren de groep een machdingen.
  2. User Bob has individual permissions set up and the Documenten Toevoenen permission is set to Toestaan . User Bob also belongs to Group A and the permissions for Documenten Toevoenen for Group A is set to Ontkennen . Bob zullen be able to Documenten Toevoenen to the Sessie .
    • Zijn individuele Machatisisisingen Neeren de Groep een machdingen.
  3. User Charlie has individual permissions set up and the Documenten Toevoenen permission is set to Toestaan . User Charlie also belongs to Group A and the permissions for Documenten Toevoenen for Group A is set to <Lang> . The Documenten Toevoenen permission for the Deelnemers group is set to Ontkennen . Charlie zullen be able to Documenten Toevoenen to the Sessie .
    • Zijn individuele Machatisisisingen Neeren de Groep een machdingen.
  4. User Alice does not have individual permissions set up, but she is part of Group A that has the Documenten Toevoenen permission set to Toestaan and she is also part of Group B that has the Documenten Toevoenen permission set to Ontkennen . Alice ZAL NIET be able to Documenten Toevoenen to the Sessie .
    • The explicit Ontkennen permission from Group B overrules the explicit Toestaan permission from Group A.
  5. User Bob does not have individual permissions set up, but he is part of Group A that has the Documenten Toevoenen permission set to Toestaan and he is part of Group B that has the Documenten Toevoenen permission set to <Lang> . The Documenten Toevoenen permission for the Deelnemers group is set to Ontkennen . Bob zullen be able to Documenten Toevoenen to the Sessie .
    • The explicit Toestaan permission from Group A overrules the inherited Ontkennen permission from Group B.

Gerelateerde onderwerpen

Toogang en machatisingen definie in Studioprojecten

Gastheer een studiosessie

Het studiopaneel

Helpgids

fullData.html:
Host a Studio Session

De Sessiehost is de Persoon Die de Studiosessie Start en BestUurt. Ze begint de Sessie, VOEN Documenten Toe, Nodigen Deelnemers Uit en Defairen de Beveiliging en machdingen. De Gastheheer Beheert Ook de Sessie Gedurende Zijn Zijn Levenscyclus, voegt nieuwe documenten teen en het het verwijten van oude, het uitnodigen van nieuwe aanwezigen, en zodra de sessie zijn cursus heeft uitgevoerd, het eindrapport voltooide Sessie.

De gastheer HOEFT NNET IN DE SESSIE TE Zijn voor Ander MENSEN OM DEEL TE NEMEN AAN DE SESSIE EN WERK. MENSEN WERKEN OP VERSCHILLENDE TIJDSTIMPEN EN Hebben Verschillende Tijden BelschikBaar voor hen voor Voorschillende soren soenden Werk. EENS EEN SESSIE Wordt Gestart, Iedereen Die Is Uitgenodigd, Kan Inloggen Op de Sessie en Werken Wanneer het voor voor de voor hen Het Handigst is.

Before you can host a Studio Session, you must have a validated Studio account. If you have not created one yet, Doe dat Eerst .

The features available to Attendees when Het Bijwonen van Een Sessie Word Word -ouderlingen Beschreven . This section addresses the features that are unique to the Host.

Een nieuwe sessie begin

You will need a validated Studio account to create a Studio Session. If you have not established one yet, see MAAK EEN STUDIO -ACCOUNT AAN to do so now.

If you have integrated Revu with ProjectWise, new Studio Sessions can be started using ProjectWise files directly from within ProjectWise. See Een Nieuwe Studiosesie starten vanuit een projectwise -Bestand for more information.

Om een ​​nieuwe sessie te starten:

  1. From the Studiopaneel , go to Toevoenen > Nieuwe Sessie . The Start Studiosessie dialog box appears.

    • If you have not already created an account, the Studio -Arcount Ananmaken dialog box appears instead. MAAK EEN STUDIO -ACCOUNT AAN before proceeding.


  2. Enter a name for this Session in the Sessienaam field. The name does not have to be unique.

  3. Click Toevoenen to select PDFs to include in the Session, or click Voeg open bestanden teen to add the files that are currently open in Revu . Files can be added later, as well. See Beheer een sessie below for more information.

    Op : Adding a PDF with a Legende to a Session will cause the Legend to appear as a Momentopnaam for as long as it is in the Session. Once the PDF is taken out of the Session, however, the Legend will resume normal functionality and will automatically update to represent changes made to the PDF while it was in the Session.

  4. Select the desired options from the Koelmacht list. These will apply universal permissions to all Attendees. Check Rood worden , Afdronkken , Aanmaak , Markup Alert , or Documenten Toevoenen to allow Attendees those permissions by default or uncheck them to remove those permissions from Attendees by default.
    • Universal permissions are automatically applied to all attendees who are not subject to individual or group permissions, which can be set up after the Session has been created. See Toogang en Machatisingen Defairen in studiosesies for more information about permissions in Studio Sessions.
  5. To restrict access to the Session by email address, select Beperk Bezoekers per e -mailadres . You will have the opportunity to add allowed attendees on the next screen, or you can do it after the Session has been created (see Beheer een sessie below for more information) . To allow any user with the Session ID to join the Session, uncheck this option.
  6. To set an expiration date for the Session, select SESSIE VerLoopt and enter the desired expiration date and time. Expiration dates must be in the future; Revu will not allow a back-dated expiration date.

  7. Click OK to save the settings and upload the files. The Invite Users dialog box appears.

    Inviting somebody to a Session automatically adds them as an Allowed Attendee in the Session Settings (see Toogang tot Toongang tot Toonang in een studiosesie for more information about Attendee Access) . In addition, the invitee is also sent an email containing information about the Session, as well as a link allowing them to automatically connect to the Session. If you do not wish to do this, click Annuleren ; the Session will be created without invitees. You can send invitations later (see Deelnemers Uitnodigen voor de sessie ) or add Attendees without sending invitations (see Toogang tot Toongang tot Toonang in een studiosesie ) .

  1. There are a few ways to add emails to the invite:
    • Typ van plak e -mails : Select this option to directly enter emails or copy and paste a list from another source.
      • Lists can be separated by commas, semicolons, spaces, have names in brackets in between them, and be a mixture of different formatting styles; Revu will analyze the list and extract recognizable email addresses.
    • Voeg e -Mails Van Groepen teen : Select this option to add emails from existing Studio Groups.
      • Hele groepen Kunnen Worden Geselecteer, alle Gebruikers Binnen Die Groep Toevoenen, van Gebruikers Kunnen AfzonderliJk Worden Geselecteer Uit een van Meer Groepen.
    • Gebruik Adresboek : Select this option to add emails from your email application's address book.
      • The email application must be MAPI compliant for Revu to access its address book. The address books from web-based email like Gmail and Yahoo cannot be accessed.

  2. After adding email addresses from a source, the Uitnodigen Gebruikers dialog box will show a list of proposed invitees sorted alphabetically and by domain.

    Bekijk Deze Lijst op naauwkeeliRigeid en voltooiing. E -Mailadrassen Kunnen Worden VERWIJDERD EN ANNEREN WORDEN TOEGEVOEGD:

    • To remove an email address, select it and click Verwijten . To remove all the email addresses under a certain domain, click the associated Verwijder het domein icon. You will be asked for confirmation when removing a domain.
    • To add more email addresses, select one of the options from the Voeg e -mails teen menu. Each of the methods described above is available.
  3. To add a message to the invitation before sending it, click Bericht Toevoenen . Messages have a 10,000 character limit and a counter will show you how close you are to the limit as you compose it.
  4. When you're satisfied with the invite list, click Nodig deelnemers uit . Emails are sent to each address in your invite list from the Studio server.
SESSIE -INSTELLINGEN Configureren

By default, all Attendees are granted the default permissions that were assigned during the creation of the Session. Additionally, if the Beperk Bezoekers per e -mailadres option was used, only those people who were invited during the creation of the Session will have access to it to begin with. You can change these conditions by configuring the Session Settings. See Toogang en Machatisingen Defairen in studiosesies .

Een sessie beheren

Once a Sessie is Gemaakt , its Deelnemersslijst set , and all the TOEGEWEZEN MACHTIGINGEN , it often requires no additional management.  However, documenteren , Deelnemers , and machdingen can be added or removed as needed over the course of a Session.

Toogang Tot de Deelnemer

Many changes to the Attendee access can be made during a Session: Uitnodigingen Kunnen Worden Verzonden naar Nieuwe Aanwezigen , Gebruikers Kunnen Toongang Worden Geweigd , De Beperkingsstatus van de sessie Kan Worden GEWIJZIGD , and Herinneringen GestUurd Naar Genodigden Die Niet -Zijn Aangesloten .

Deelnemers Uitnodigen voor de sessie

  1. Click Uitnodiging at the top of the Attendees section of the Studiopaneel . The Uitnodigen Gebruikers dialog box appears.

  1. There are a few ways to add emails to the invite:
    • Typ van plak e -mails : Select this option to directly enter emails or copy and paste a list from another source.
      • Lists can be separated by commas, semicolons, spaces, have names in brackets in between them, and be a mixture of different formatting styles; Revu will analyze the list and extract recognizable email addresses.
    • Voeg e -Mails Van Groepene Toe : Select this option to add emails from existing Studio Groups.
      • Hele gropenen Kunnen Worden Geselecteer, alle Gebruikers Binnen Die Groep Toevoenen, van Gebruikers Kunnen AfzonderliJk Worden Geselecteer Uit een van Meer Groepen.
    • Gebruik Adresboek : Select this option to add emails from your email application's address book.
      • The email application must be MAPI compliant for Revu to access its address book. The address books from web-based email like Gmail and Yahoo cannot be accessed.

  2. After adding email addresses from a source, the Uitnodigen Gebruikers dialog box will show a list of proposed invitees sorted alphabetically and by domain.

    Bekijk Deze Lijst op naauwkeeliRigeid en voltooiing. E -Mailadrassen Kunnen Worden VERWIJDERD EN ANNEREN WORDEN TOEGEVOEGD:

    • To remove an email address, select it and click Verwijten . To remove all the email addresses under a certain domain, click the associated Verwijder het domein icon. You will be asked for confirmation when removing a domain.
    • To add more email addresses, select one of the options from the Voeg e -mails teen menu. Each of the methods described above is available.
  3. To add a message to the invitation before sending it, click Bericht Toevoenen . Messages have a 10,000 character limit and a counter will show you how close you are to the limit as you compose it.
  4. When you're satisfied with the invite list, click Nodig deelnemers uit . Emails are sent to each address in your invite list from the Studio server.
Iemand Weigeren tegang tot een sessie

Sometimes it is necessary to deny somebody access to a Session after they have attended and participated in the Session (as opposed to denying somebody access to a Session preemptively, Die hiër Wordt Bevschreven ). This action locks the denied user out of the Session and precludes them from accessing its documents, records, and so on. During the process, you will be given an opportunity to reassign control of their markups to somebody else in the Session, giving that person the ability change or delete those markups. Note that somebody cannot be denied access to a Session while they are signed into it. There are a few ways to deny somebody access to a Session:

  • Join the Session, then right-click the name in the Samsevoetd list and select Ontkennen .

  • Join the Session, then click Toogang Tot de Deelnemer . When the Toogang Tot de Deelnemer dialog box appears, select the name in the list and click Ontkennen .

  • Join the Session, then click SESSIE -INSTELLEN . When the SESSIE -INSTELLEN dialog box appears, click the Deelnemers tab, then select the desired name and click Ontkennen .

Wanneer U iemand Uit de sessie VERWIJDERT ontmoette Behulp van een van de Bovenstaante Methoden, word u gevraagd wat u Moe Doen ontmoette betrokking tot controle over hun markups.

Ordinarily, when somebody is removed from a Session any markups they placed end up locked and not editable. This is the default option and, if that is the desired outcome (or if you know the person placed no markups and thus has none to reassign), leave LAAT IEMAND ANDERS Zijn Markups Niet -bezien selected and click De Gebruiker Weigeren .

In some cases, it is preferable to assign control over the user's markups to somebody else. To do so, select Opnieuuw toewijzen om hun markups te bewers and choose the person who assume control over their markups from the dropdown list that appears, then click De Gebruiker Weigeren .

Voorzichtigheid: Users who have been denied access to a Session and had their markups reassigned niet be readmitted to the Session.

Laat op de bovenstaante voorzichtiEid van een paar dingen bijet het opnieuuw toewijzen Van markup -controle:

  • MARKUP -controle kan alle Worden ToeGewezen Aan Aan Een Huidige Sessie -DeelNemers en Die Persoon Moet Revu 2016.5 van Hoger Gebruiken. Als de GEwenste Persoon nog niet is niet -getegetredden tot de sessie, MOETEN ZE DUNEN voordat de markup -westing aan ken kan kan kane Worden ToeGewezen.
  • Meerdere gebruikers kunnen tegelijkertijd de toegang tot de sessie worden geweigerd, maar al hun markups moeten op dezelfde manier worden afgehandeld: geen van hen wordt opnieuw toegewezen of ze worden allemaal opnieuw toegewezen aan dezelfde persoon.
  • Markup reassignment will be recorded in the Sessielogboek and reflected in the Markeringenlijst . In addition, reassignments will also show up in Sessierapporten and Samenvattingen when those reporting options are selected.
  • Deelnemers Aan Wie Markup Control is ToeGewezen, ontvangene een E -Mail Die Hen Informeerert over de Opdracht. Als ze momentel in de sessie Zijn, Kunnen ze ook een melding krijgen in de aanvraag en worden gevraagd om de sessie te verlaten en opnieuw in te varen.

An Attendee can be allowed back into the Session after they have been denied access Zolang de controle over hun markups Niet -opnieuw werden ToeGewezen . Simply follow one of the methods described above and click Toestaan instead of Ontkennen .

De touwang tot een bestaat sessie beperken

U Kunt uvoor Kiezen om de Tegang tot een sessie te beperken om alleen Uitnodigingen te zijn, zelfs als u deze optie niet hebt Gekzen Bijet Maken van de Sessie. Hiermee Kunnen alle AGEGANG TOT MENSEN DIE U OPGEEFT. Doe een van de Volgende Om deze optie voor de bestaante sessie in Te Schakelen:

  • Join the Session, then click Toogang Tot de Deelnemer . When the Toogang Tot de Deelnemer dialog box appears, check Bepperk de AanweZigen per e-mailadres and click OK .
  • Join the Session, then click click SESSIE -INSTELLEN . When the SESSIE -INSTELLEN dialog box appears, click the Deelnemers tab, then check Bepperk de AanweZigen per e-mailadres and click OK .

Once you have turned this option on, be sure to confirm that everybody you wish to include in the Session are allowed in, either by Ze Uitnodigen or by Ze Toevoenen Aan de Lijst ontmoette AanweZigen .

Herinneringen Verzenden

After inviting users to join your Session, they will be listed on the Studiopaneel as having either Samsevoetd or Niet -SamengeVoetd . You can send a customized reminder to those who have not yet joined.

  1. Join the Session and select the Niet -SamengeVoetd tab. Any invitees who have not yet joined the Session will be listed here. Before they join, invitees are identified by their email address only.

  2. Select the invitees to whom you wish to send a reminder by checking the box beside their email address. To send reminders to everybody in the list, check the box beside Selecteer OM TE TE HERINNEREN at the top of the list.

  3. Click Stuur een herinnering to compose and send a reminder to the selected invitees. Reminder messages have a 10,000 character limit and a counter will show you how close you are to the limit as you compose it.
Documentheren

Documenten Kunnen Worden toegevoetd Wanneer Kan ook documenten toevoenen en verwijten tijdens de sessie.

Adding a File

Session attendees with the Documenten toStemming Toevoenen can add files to the Session.

Adding a PDF with a Legende to a Session will cause the Legend to appear as a Momentopnaam for as long as it is in the Session. Once the PDF is taken out of the Session, however, the Legend will resume normal functionality and will automatically update to represent changes made to the PDF while it was in the Session.

  1. Doe Mee ontmoette de Sessie.
  2. Click Voeg bestand teen in the Documenteren section of the Studiopaneel .
    • If the desired PDF is already open in Revu , you can also right-click it and select Toevoenen Aan Open Studio Session to add it directly.

  3. Navigate to and select the desired file or files and click Open .

    Op : In order to upload or download a file in Studio, the system clock of the local machine must be set up correctly so that it is in sync (within 15 minutes) with UTC, otherwise any attempt to upload or download a file in Studio will result in an error. Update the system clock of the local machine so that it is correct for the time zone specified in its Date and Time settings and try the upload or download again.

Deleting a File

Er Zijn Twee Manieren om delete a file from a Session:

  • Join the Session, then right-click on the name in the Documenteren section of the Studio -tabblad and select Verwijten .
  • Join the Session, then click Verwijten at the right of the document name in the Documenteren section of the Studiopaneel . This icon will appear when the mouse is moved over the document's name.
VRAGEN DAT ALLE AANWEZIGEN DE GASTHERE VOLGEN

While a Session Attendee can choose to VOLG EEN ANDER DEELNEMER , a Session Host can request that all Attendees of a Session follow them at the same time.  This ability is only available to Session Hosts and can only be used when the Host is joined by two or more attendees. To invoke the request, do one of the following:

  • Join the Session, then click the Volgen icon at the right your own name in the Deelnemers list of the Studiopaneel (as if you were trying to follow yourself).
  • Join the Session, then type "follow me" (without the quotes) in the chat field at the bottom of the Studiopaneel .

A request to follow the Session Host will be sent to all Session attendees, enabling multiple Attendees to follow the Host at the same time. Attendees must Accepteer Het verzoek om te begin Anden Met Het Volgen van de Host .

Een sessieveerslag Maken

At any point during the course of a Session you can generate a Session Report and save it to your computer. You will also have the opportunity to create such a report when you MAAK DE SESSIE AF .

Om een ​​sessieveerslag te maken:

  1. Doe Mee ontmoette de Sessie.

  2. Click Verstandhouding under the Dossier tab of the Studiopaneel . The Sessierapport dialog box appears.

  3. Select the Type of report that you would like to create:
    • Recordoverzicht creates a PDF file containing the contents of the Recordsectie van Het Tabblad Studio .
    • Pdf -pakketrapport creates a PDF package containing the Record Summary and all of the documents in the session.

    • Combineer Bestand S Verstandhouding creates a single PDF that contains the Record Summary and all of the documents in the session.

      Op : The Pdf -pakketrapport and Combinatie Bestand S Verstandhouding contain hyperlinks in the Record Summary that link to the corresponding markup in the document â just like you are still within the session. This lets you review the Record and then jump to the markup in the document.

  4. Enter a Titel for the PDF file or package that will be created.
  5. Enter a heading for any Op S you wish to include in the report and add the notes in the field immediately below.
  6. Select the Paginegrootte and orientation ( Portret or Landschap ) .
  7. Select any or all of the following opties :
    • Voeg de Lijst ontmoette Deelnemers Toe : When selected, the Report Summary will include a list of Session Attendees.
    • Voeg documentenlijst teen : When selected, the Report Summary will include a list of Session Documents.
    • Neem recorditems op : When selected, the Report Summary will include a list of the Session's historical events, as captured on the Session's Records Tab .
      • Alleen Gefilterde -items : When selected, the list of the Session's historical events will respect the filters currently in effect on the Session's Records Tab . If this option is selected, a note will be added to the Report Summary regarding which filters were in effect when the report was created.
  8. Select the Kolommen from the Session's Records tab that should be included in the report. Choices include: Datum , Tijd , Document and Pagina .
  9. Click OK to create the Report.
Een sessie afmaken

Finishing a Session ends the Session and removes its documents from the Studio server. Only Hosts and users with VOLDIGE MACHTIGINGEN to the Session can finish it. You will have the opportunity to create a Sessierapport and save Session documents, as desired.

Om een ​​sessie af te maken:

  1. Word Lid Van de Sessie en Zorg Ervoor Dat niemand in de sessie Werkt Aan Sessiedocumenten.

  2. From the <Sessienaam & id -menu> , select Afwerking -sessie .

    The Afwerking -sessie dialog box appears.

  3. To include the markups of specific Attendees in the Session documents that you choose to save, select those Attendees in the Erbij Betrekken Markeren list.
  4. Choose one of the Bewaar -opties :
    • Opslaan (Bestaante overschrijven) saves the files back to the locations from which they were originally uploaded to the Session and overwrite any files with the same name that are currently there. This essentially replaces the original files with the ones from the Session. Do not choose this option if you need to preserve the original files and have not made backups already.
    • Opslaan in kaart saves the Session documents in a specified folder. To change the default folder location, click and navigate to the desired folder.
      • Select Sessiemap to create a subfolder with the Session name in the specified location.
    • SLA Niet op bestanden op discards the Session documents without saving them.
  5. Select Sluit bestanden na het voltooien to automatically close any Session files that are currently open in Revu when the Session is finished, otherwise they will stay open.
  6. Select Genereer -rapport to generate a Sessierapport before finishing the Session. To specify the Session Report settings, click Opzetten and the Sessierapport dialog box will appear. See Sessierapport for more information about Session Report settings.
    • The Session Report is saved in the folder specified in the field below. To change the default folder location, click and navigate to the desired folder.

  7. Click OK to finish the Session.

    Op : The Session and all of its files are removed from the Studio server when the Session is finished. This can be undone through the Studioportaal within a limited time frame. See support.bluebeam.com for more information about recovering finalized or archived Studio Sessions.
